../ui/src/components/accordion/accordion.description:
An interactive UI component that lets users toggle the visibility of content.
The content section can be expanded to reveal details and collapsed to hide them,
keeping information organized and saving space. Commonly used in FAQs, settings panels,
and documentation to present layered content efficiently.

onToggleOpen.description: Callback run when the open state changes

../ui/src/components/avatar/avatar.tsx.description: Component for displaying user avatars with various sizes

username.description: Provide to use it as alt of the image for better a11y

styles.description: Class name meant to be used by parent components using <BaseButton /> directly

../ui/src/components/checkbox/checkbox.t.description: A customizable checkbox component that supports three states: checked, unchecked, and indeterminate. It can be used in forms or as a standalone control.

indeterminate.description: Whether the checkbox is in an indeterminate state

../ui/src/components/date-picker/date-pi.description: Component for selecting a date with customizable format and placeholder

defaultValue.description:
Default date value when the component is initially rendered.

For the "default" is a single date, for the "range" [date, date]; and for the "multiple", an array of dates.

error.description: Whether the date picker has an error

placeholder.description: Placeholder text to show when no date is selected

value.description:
Controlled value for the selected date

For the "default" is a single date, for the "range" [date, date]; and for the "multiple", an array of dates.

valueFormat.description:
Format string to control how the selected date is displayed
(e.g., 'yyyy-MM-dd')

state.description: The visual state of the edge. Determines base styles like `strokeWidth`.

type.description:
Determines the layout style for the EdgeLabel based on its content:

text: Simple text label.
icon: Single icon without additional content.
compound: Mixed content like icons + text, multiple icons, etc.

endAdornment.description: Element displayed at the end of the input field.

size.description:
Specifies the size of the input field.
Can be 'small', 'medium', or 'large'.

startAdornment.description: Element displayed at the start of the input field.

children.description:
The trigger element that will open the menu when clicked.
This element will be wrapped in a button with appropriate ARIA attributes.

items.description:
Array of menu items to be rendered in the menu.
Each item can be either a regular menu item or a separator.

elements.name: signature
intersection

offset.description: Distance between a popup and the trigger element

onOpenChange.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be opened or closed.

tsType.name: signature
tsType.raw:
(
  event: MouseEvent | KeyboardEvent | FocusEvent | null,
  open: boolean,
) => void

open.description:
Controls whether the menu is open or closed.
When omitted, the menu's open state will be managed internally
and toggled by clicking on the `children` trigger element.

size.description:
Size variant for the menu items.
@default 'medium'

../ui/src/components/modal/modal.tsx.description: A modal dialog component that appears on top of the main content,

children.description: Content to be displayed in the modal body

footer.description: Content to be displayed in the modal footer

onClose.description: Callback function called when the modal is closed

open.description: Controls the visibility of the modal

subtitle.description: Optional subtitle displayed below the title

title.description: Title displayed in the modal header

../ui/src/components/radio-button/radio..description: A radio button component that allows users to select a single option from a group.

checked.description: Whether the radio button is checked

name.description: The name of the radio button group

onChange.description: Callback fired when the radio button state changes

size.description: The size of the radio button

value.description: The value of the radio button

elements.name: intersection
intersection
signature
intersection
signature
intersection

../ui/src/components/select/select.tsx.description: Component for displaying a select dropdown with customizable size, placeholder, and item list

className.description: Custom class name for the component.

error.description: Whether the select has an error

items.description: List of items to display in the select dropdown

elements.name: signature
intersection
signature
intersection

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the select input

../ui/src/components/separator/separator.description: A visual separator component that creates a horizontal line to divide content.

../ui/src/components/snackbar/snackbar.t.description:
A Snackbar component that displays brief messages about app processes.
The snackbar appears at the bottom of the screen and automatically disappears after a few seconds.

close.description: Whether to show the close button

onButtonClick.description: Callback fired when the action button is clicked

onClose.description: Callback fired when the snackbar is closed

subtitle.description: Optional secondary message displayed below the title

title.description: Main message displayed in the snackbar

variant.description: Visual style variant of the snackbar

../ui/src/components/status/status.tsx.description: A component that displays a visual indicator based on validation status.

className.description: Custom class name for the component.

checked.description: Whether the switch is checked or not

className.description: Custom class name for the switch component

onChange.description: Callback function when the switch state changes

styles.description: Custom styles to apply to the switch

thumbChildren.description: Custom content for the thumb of the switch

trackChildren.description: Custom content for the track of the switch

../ui/src/components/switch/switch.tsx.description:
A Switch component that allows users to toggle between two states, such as on and off.
Typically used for settings or preferences, it provides immediate visual feedback.

checked.description: Whether the switch is checked or not

className.description: Custom class name for the switch component

onChange.description: Callback function when the switch state changes

styles.description: Custom styles to apply to the switch

thumbChildren.description: Custom content for the thumb of the switch

trackChildren.description: Custom content for the track of the switch

../ui/src/components/text-area/text-area.description: Component for displaying a textarea with customizable size, rows, and error state

className.description: Custom class name for the textarea

error.description: Whether the textarea has an error

maxRows.description: Maximum number of rows the textarea can expand to

minRows.description: Minimum number of rows the textarea can expand to

onBlur.description:
Function called when the input loses focus.
The event parameter may be undefined.

onChange.description: Callback function to handle change in textarea value

spellCheck.description: Enables or disables browser spell checking

../ui/src/components/tooltip/tooltip-con.description: Tooltips Content is the component that pops out when the tooltip is open.

tooltipType.description: TooltipType determines the color type of the tooltip

../ui/src/components/tooltip/tooltip-tri.description: Tooltips trigger is the the element that toggles the tooltip

asChild.description: `asChild` allows the user to pass any element as the anchor

../ui/src/components/tooltip/tooltip.tsx.description: Tooltips display informative text when users hover over, focus on, or tap an element.

initialOpen.description: If true, the component is shown at initial

onOpenChange.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be open.

open.description: If true, the component is shown.
